questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image of the equipment.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again.
confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment.
prepare the Incident/Damage and Missing Report.
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON and the LED’s illuminate.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage 230.
shift the equipment to another place where the AC voltage of 230 is provided
check the power cord continuity as shown in the video and confirm whether the power cord is defective.
then replace the power cord with the new one
check and confirm whether there is carbon formation/breakage or damage to the Input module.
clean the Input module or replace the Input module with a new one
open the equipment as shown in the video, check whether there is any loose connection/breakage of cable between Input module and Power supply board.
reseat or replace the cable accordingly
check whether the output of 15VDC is available at the Power supply Board.
repair/replace the Power supply board accordingly
check whether there is any loose connection/breakage of cable between Power supply board and Control board.
reseat/replace the cable accordingly
repair/replace the Control board with a new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the control board

questions.question: check and confirm whether the LED’s illuminates but the display is blank/no text on display.
open the equipment, check the continuity of ON /OFF switch and confirm whether the switch is defective.
replace the switch with the new one
check and confirm the connections between backlight and Switch control board and also the connection between display and control board for any loose connections or breakage of cables.
reseat/replace the cables accordingly
replace the display with a new one
check and confirm whether the display appears half or brightness is dim or screen flickering.
check the connections between display and control board for any loose connections or breakage of cables.
reseat/replace the cables accordingly
replace the display with a new one
check and confirm whether the button do not respond when operating
check the continuity of switches on switch control board and confirm whether the switches are defective.
replace the switches accordingly
replace the switch control board with the new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the switch control board

questions.question: check and confirm whether the printer paper does not roll during the print.
replace the motor with a new one
check and confirm whether print is dull/discontinues.
clean the thermal head and confirm whether the problem still persist.
replace the thermal head with a new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the thermal head

questions.question: If the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for any other assistance through video call.
Thanks
